p: The effect of nutrient media and different PGRs on regeneration possibilities from centaury leaf explants have been investigated in several previous studies [ 59, 60, 61, 62], but in all these reports, only adventitious buds and calli regenerated on the leaf explants. Recent research revealed that centaury leaf explants cultured on hormone-free medium in the light produced only a few shoots, while roots developed in darkness [ 28]. Both organogenesis and rhizogenesis occurred directly, without the callusing stage, but no somatic embryos developed on hormone-free media [ 28].
